content: Hello Folks, welcome to the Embedded SIG. We're in the middle of getting all the necessary logistics complete. I'm working to get the logistics in place to support our initial set of meetings, and to allow us to select chairs. As mentioned in our charter, we'd love to have meets scheduled in each of the 3 timezones; Asia Pacific, Europe and the Americas, hopefull with chairs in each time zone to support this. Lot's to do - I'll keep you all posted on progress here.

Hello everyone! :wave: I wanted to take a chance to say hi

My name's Pete. I work for Woven by Toyota. I'm still very much a newbie to the WebAssembly landscape, but @Chris Woods let me know about this SIG which seemed like a great fit to say my hellos
